website_summaries.verdict: Contains the basic kitchen set, with versatile items that get the most use.
pros: Stainless is the professionals’ choice for durability, versatility and easy cleaning, including in dishwashers
Pots are extremely durable and dishwasher safe for easy cleaning convenience
Unlike nonstick products, these can be used with induction cooktops
cons: The larger pans can take a while time to heat up

customer_reviews.title: no label or notice that says its 18/10 or 18/8 Stainless Steel
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get a set of stainless steel pots to be more cautious about what chemicals I ingest in my body (stay away from teflon). I learned that stainless steel grade 18/8 and 18/10 have an acceptable balance of nickel and chromium (which leeched in high doses overtime is bad for you). However, when my pots arrived there is no label on them or notice in the instructions or box that says they are 18/10 or 18/8 quality. Its disappointing since I am specifically getting this to be more health conscious but have no guarantee of their quality. If you're buying these for the same reason I suggest you look at other options.
customer_reviews.author: ZB

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: This set is good but the variety of sizes are kind of stupid. There is 2 very tiny pots and they don’t fit barely anything. The big pot is wonderful I just hope there was one medium pot instead of the 2 very small sauce pans. The color is cute and they are easy to clean. I like the wooden spoons that came with them too.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Rachel Ray quality for my new glass cooktop!
customer_reviews.text: I have a new apartment with a glass-surface cooktop, and I needed cookware that would work on it. And because I love the quality of Rachel Ray products, this was the only place I turned. And there were no disappointment with this purchase. The same high quality in stainless steel as with my old anodized aluminum pots and pans, and as always, I recommend this product for anyone with a glass cooktop. Rachel Ray means quality for the kitchen. And this set is no exception!
customer_reviews.author: david jennings hansen

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! Easy to stain and a bit difficult to take off the stains but scrubbing hard with windex seems to help.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Well made, stylish, cool handles. Recommended
customer_reviews.text: My wife replaced an old aluminum set because the anti-stick coating was flaking on the most used items. She likes these very much. They heat evenly, the lids are great and stainless steel is much lighter than aluminum... never mind cast iron. The handles are comfortable and stay cool. Nice set for not a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: CoachTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Well made but sticky
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made, good weight and heat distribution. Unfortunately food tends to stick unless extra effort is made to prep the surface prior to cooking. It also discolors when used and is nearly impossible to remove discoloration even with vigorous scrubbing with cleanser. It's just harder to maintain than non-stick, but it's not going to wear out and flake off into food either.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: In love with my pans!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Rachel Ray pots and pans! Evenly distributes the heat in the pan and does not burn!
customer_reviews.author: Richie Chapple

customer_reviews.title: Change your cookware for healthy cooking
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's stainless steel nice for cooking much healthier theyre sturdy easy to clean and they look nice
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great pan set for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Heats evenly, super fast cleanup. Very sturdy. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Imbrogno

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, and clean
customer_reviews.text: Love them ! Had them for about 6 months now. They are hefty and work well. I use them everyday multiple times . I would reccomend to anyone. When they do get a little stained up from grease or cooking whatever I use a little sos/ brillo steel wool pad and it comes right off . 6 months and mh pans still look brand new . And now weird chemicals leeching into my food.....
customer_reviews.author: S. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Don't like the way they cook
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited I finally was able to buy a really nice set of pots and pans so racel rays seem to be nice steel with red handles were nice and for the price I paid I thought would be great for cooking durable but was so disappointed in the way they cook they burn my food and the burn easily they are hard to clean off the pans. So so disappointed not worth my money wish I could send them back. Just not happy with them. Sorry Rachel Ray cause I think your awesome. Just don't like the quality. I don't recommend 😒
customer_reviews.author: GinaB

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: After first use these wierd spots appeared. I was so excited about heat distribution, the sturdiness and how is it was to clean and now I'm left disappointed at seeing these wierd spots.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Terrible set
customer_reviews.text: Terrible set. Just received it yesterday and went to cook breakfast in one pan and EVERYTHING stuck to it even after turning the food every minute to avoid the sticking. Poor quality definitely would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia langfels

customer_reviews.title: Damage caused by actually using the items
customer_reviews.text: We used the pot and frying pan one time and now it has pits at the bottom of each. I don’t know if we should even use them again in fear of the coating flaking off into our food. We used to have a set of this cookware and didn’t have issues before. Maybe the quality went down? I am really upset because the color of the handles and the shine of the stainless steel is really pretty.
customer_reviews.author: imradgineer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Solid pots and pans but I gave them 1 star because they're a nightmare to clean and everything sticks to them. I would never buy these again for that reason. Even with using oil and cooking spray eggs still stick to them. Worst pans I've ever bought considering how ridiculous it is to clean them after each use
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Steffani

customer_reviews.title: Good set for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set for the price! Can’t complain! I like the silicone handles too. The set looks nice in my pot rack
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Really nice cookware set
customer_reviews.text: Cookware came in new condition (no dents) and looks really nice. This set is on the small side if you're cooking for more than three people on a daily basis but it's perfect for one or two people. I haven't used them yet but I'm hoping with proper care they will continue to look good.
customer_reviews.author: Coco H

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy them as a gift.
customer_reviews.text: We bought these pots and pans a couple months ago. We think they are great pans. Price was great too. I’d buy them as a gift. We bought the red set. Lids fit great also. I like they are glass so I can see the food inside.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie5419

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: These pots and pans are only worth it for a very short time. After a couple months everything begins to stick regardless of how much oil you add. I’ll be buying better pots and pans and they won’t be Rachel Ray.
customer_reviews.author: brandon tervo

customer_reviews.title: Everything sticks!!
customer_reviews.text: I like how the heat distributes evenly. However, no matter what I cook, EVERYTHING sticks to the bottom. It takes me more time to clean the pans. I dread using these pans to cook because I know everything will stick to the bottom! I have tried turning down the heat, using oil and it doesn’t help. Even cooking hamburger or sausage stuck to the bottom! It’s disappointing!!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Mclean

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get ripped off
customer_reviews.text: Shame on you Rachel,I live by myself I’m a widow and there’s no way I can return these pots and pans I watched you for years enjoy watching you but this is ridiculous I’m sending pictures
customer_reviews.author: Jo P.

customer_reviews.title: not what we expected
customer_reviews.text: this is cute, but common its not practical it is not non stick and even with butter oil stuff sticks it stinks - actually do not buy it im trashing all mine they stick !!! all food gets ruined
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A present for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a Christmas present for my daughter, she hasn't complained.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Great set for price
customer_reviews.text: Had about a month now- Cooks very well, easy to clean. Like that they stack for storage. There has been some discoloration at the bottom, but it hasn't affected function at all.
customer_reviews.author: kyle koeller

customer_reviews.title: Gift for Wife
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the Mrs. She is very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to clean
customer_reviews.text: These pans are so difficult to clean. We have had them for less than a month and are already looking for a new set of pots and pans to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sage Steele

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to clean, after one use they looked burnt.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: No comments
customer_reviews.text: The plastic on one of the pots was the Factive the spoon was damaged we trying to reach to the company with a message and we never got an answer back
customer_reviews.author: Jesus yes

customer_reviews.title: They stain pretty fast
customer_reviews.text: They are cute and I like the silicone handles, so the sides don't get that hot. But they stained probably on the first use, is not that easy to clean them and afterward, watermarks remain as if it had sea saltwater pigments mainly on the bottom of the pots.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so thrilled I got this for my Mom for Mother’s Day. The inside of the pots have measurements and are easy to clean and cook with. I’ll be purchasing a 2nd set for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Annastasia Villegas

customer_reviews.title: Can’t get burn marks off
customer_reviews.text: Very upset and disappointed with these. The first time I finally used and my pan burned. I can not get it off and won’t use anymore. I’m so upset that I spend money on them.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Marinello

customer_reviews.title: Pans are awesome!! Lids...not so much
customer_reviews.text: Two lids came bent :( boo. The pans themselves are super sturdy and actually beyond expectation there. I have a better set of lids from a previous RR set that fits and matches so not with returning for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel is wasn't in this case.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to purchase this set I have had bought her collection of pots before & loved them. However this set it's not worth the money every single pan sticks very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Not Great.
customer_reviews.text: After just two weeks of use it is very apparent the non-stick feature of these does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Symone

customer_reviews.title: Food sticks to pans!
customer_reviews.text: All of the food sticks to the pans even when I spray or use olive oil or butter! I’m having to buy another set and I just got these!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Best set i have owned yet!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and they are a lot more durable than expected!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: T.J.

customer_reviews.title: low quality steel
customer_reviews.text: it's of low quality steel.. pan changed the colour with in 3 use.. waste of my $122.
customer_reviews.author: Bibin

customer_reviews.title: Season the pans first!
customer_reviews.text: These are an awesome deal for the money... I actually love them. If anybody buys them you definitely have to season them 1st or they will stick. I seasoned them and they worked perfectly! I still wouldn't and fry an egg in them or anything like that. So I would definitely keep a teflon pan around for that... For an the average person they are amazing and made well.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon March

customer_reviews.title: Not a practical started pot set.
customer_reviews.text: This set is not made up of practical sizes at all. I have another set of Rachel ray pots that i LOVE so I thought this would measure up. The pots are small and don't don't wash super well. I'm pretty disappointed in this pot set. I do like that the 6 quart pot has a measurement line inside of it.
customer_reviews.author: NechTelle

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay, but I'm just not into it.
customer_reviews.text: I will admit first thing that i’m very new to stainless cookware. Having said that, I do believe this set is nice, but I’m still not thrilled with it. Food still sticks (badly) even with oil or butter in the pan. It holds on to that cloudy, white mineral deposit something fierce. However, I like that the cookware is sturdy and the handles have grips. I’m still giving the cookware a fairly good review because I’m chalking this up to my inexperience, but I’m also wishing I could still return it.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good product!
customer_reviews.text: I love using stainless cooking pans ,so I love this pans, they are look very sturdy and cute! Except from a little dent in one lid but isn’t a problem for me ! Now I am excited to used it !
customer_reviews.author: Rizza

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife since we have bought 2 complete nonstick cook sets and we were disappointed. Yes there is a learning curve to using this set. But have found that this is a great set. My wife really likes the measuring marks on the inside of the sauce pan.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Bunz

customer_reviews.title: Everything sticks
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually write reviews but I feel obligated to do so. These pans are terrible! Everything and I mean everything sticks to them. No oil, sticks. Very little oil, sticks. Lots of oil, still sticks. Nothing you do and everything still sticks. I’m a decent cook..know how to cook..and these are terrible. For the price they are not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Be prepared to scrub your heart out with these pots and pans. Everything I have cooked in them gets stuck to the bottom even with oil. It took me 30 mins to scrub hash browns off the bottom the very first time I cooked it in. If I still had the box, these would have already been returned.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie P.

customer_reviews.title: Always Looking Good!
customer_reviews.text: Somewhere along the line, I pick up a sauce pan from an older set. Eventually, I gave away all of my old stuff, and bought this. The handles are nifty, and the pots look good.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Borgen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! It's hard to find pots and pans that work just right. These exceeded my expectations. They are amazing. Have I said that yet? We've had them for a few months and they still look brand new after using them every day. Things don't stick in them. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: alot heavier than expected , love the red handles and stainless steel.. Spots easily if not dried right away after washing. Have not tried the dishwasher yet tho.. Very happy with our purchase
customer_reviews.author: C. Green

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price !
customer_reviews.text: Great pots and Pans! I use them daily for a large family ;)
customer_reviews.author: Mimi37

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set. Very sturdy and love the color of the handles!
customer_reviews.author: AvidKindleFan

product_meta.title: Rachael Ray Create Delicious Stainless Steel Cookware Set, 10-Piece Pots and Pans Set, Stainless Steel with Light Blue Handles
product_meta.description: Color:Stainless Steel with Light Blue HandlesThe Rachael Ray 70412 Create Delicious 10-Piece Stainless Steel Cookware Set brings high performance and easy convenience to home chefs eager for kitchen versatility with style. Featuring stainless steel construction, this collection of essential pots and pans boasts engineering for even heat distribution to reduce hot spots that can burn foods, and an induction-compatible base provides durability for years of cooking enjoyment. Dual-riveted stainless steel and silicone handles provide comfort and control and all of the pots and pans are oven safe to 400°F. The shatter resistant glass lids lock in heat and flavor while allowing foods to be monitored while they cook. Plus, the whole cookware set is dishwasher safe for fast and easy cleanup. From dishwasher-safe convenience to enhanced durability and polished shine, reach for the Rachael Ray 70412 Create Delicious 10-Piece Stainless Steel Cookware Set and get ready to create delish.
feature_bullets: EASY CLEANING COOKWARE: Convenient and versatile 10-piece pots and pans set with shatter resistant glass lids is dishwasher safe for fast and easy cleanup.
STAINLESS STEEL COOKWARE SET: Durable, polished stainless steel pots and pans feature etched measurement markings for full function and full shine.
STRONG & VERSATILE POTS AND PANS: Induction-suitable base for ultra strength and durability is compatible with any stovetop. Flared rims for easy pouring.
CRANK UP THE HEAT: 10-piece pots and pans set has double-riveted, stainless steel and silicone handles that are oven safe to 400 degrees Fahrenheit.

PRODUCT DETAILS: 10-Piece Set includes 1-Quart Pan, 2-Quart Pan with Lid, 6-Quart Stockpot with Lid, 10.25-Inch Deep Pan, 3-Quart Saute Pan with Lid, Spoon, Slotted Turner, Stainless Steel. Lifetime warranty.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars244 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
